name: Space spear
description:
Future is here!

Fly on your futuristic spaceship and destroy every enemy on your way with your powerful dash thruster!

How to play:
W A S D - movement;
Space - dash. With dash you can kill enemies and avoid taking damage.
Follow the direction of the green arrow to find enemies.

COMPLETE THE MISSION, SOLDIER!

Made by Lalapupsen and Choo
Music by Andrewkn

Made in 72 hours
